segments.text: I'm really starting to feel a sense of unease watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous overflow from the sink is just... unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, soaking the cabinets and forming a wide puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a waste of water, and it's going to cause real damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fact that the woman doesn't notice makes it even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, for crying out loud!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her obliviousness is truly astounding to behold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids are adding to the impending mess with their cookie scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is so unstable, it's just begging for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically hear the 'thud' of the boy falling and the 'crash' of the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules right under her nose, which is frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is making me a bit queasy with its impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
